page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO THE PROJECT
page.content: Branston,a one time small country village in the heart of Lincolnshire is situated 5 miles from Lincoln.It has always been a farming area. Since the war though Branston has grown as people have moved into the area to seek work in Lincoln. Branston now has 3 schools,4 housing estates and over 3000 people.For the survey,we went to places of interest in Branston. We visited Patrick Dean Ltd, which is a local farming company,the Old Hall and the three schools.We spoke to people in Branston interviewing them on a wide variety of subjects including religion and housing.Some people visited the church which is part Saxon,and spoke to the vicar.We interviewed people about their jobs.We also visited our parish council and wrote to our local M.P .
